title: Faculty-Librarian Collaborative Learning Design: Building Partnerships for Critical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design, language teaching experience, and familiarity with library resource utilization
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance language education competencies for corporate administrator/leader role learners. Simulates real work scenarios in VR environments and develops collaborative models between instructors and librarians.

learning_goals: Learners can develop one or more language education scenarios by applying teacher-librarian collaborative learning design principles.
Learners can explain how to implement effective collaborative learning strategies using smartphone-based tools in resource-constrained technical environments.
Learners can propose methods to measure collaborative learning outcomes using project-based assessment tools.

resources: Corporate Language Training Database Access Permissions
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
